properties.Name: Cashel Street and Clarkson Avenue
properties.Intro: In 2024, temporary streetscape improvements and a mural were delivered at the Cashel Street and Clarkson Avenue intersection.
properties.Detail:
In 2024, temporary streetscape improvements and a mural were delivered at the Cashel Street and Clarkson Avenue intersection.

Seating, planters, trees, cycle stands, and colour were added in response to community feedback.

The mural(https://ccc.govt.nz/culture-and-community/community-led-development/enliven-places-programme/artworks-and-beautification#cashelstreet) is located at Elim Church at 285 Cashel Street.

This project enhances the limited public amenities in this evolving mixed-use area and helps to create a vibrant, green and thriving South-East Central(external link).
properties.Priority: Central City Action Plan - Project 8011 (SE Neighbourhoods)

properties.Name: Green Wayfinding tower
properties.Intro: When many former landmarks were removed, four new bright and fun towers pointed towards activities and places worth a visit.
properties.Detail:
Situated on prominent corners, the 8m towers were designed to be viewed at a distance with key streets and places identified at a high level, and more detailed maps and activities information for eye level viewing.
4.	Each of the towers will have the street names (one on each of the four faces) and will point to a number of key destinations. Panels also include a calendar of events and a map indicating walking times.
5.	The Towers have been designed to resist graffiti and inhibit climbing. 
Gifted to Otakaro, and shifted Te Pae Plaza
Reskinned in glossy black by Auckland creative studio Creature Post, work is called Conduit. The tower was  designed to be representat the connection between earth and sky through light.

properties.Name: Blue Wayfinding towers
properties.Intro: When many former landmarks were removed, four new bright and fun towers pointed towards activities and places worth a visit.
properties.Detail: Decomissioned/retired with the East Frame development began on that block. Installed on vacant site, later temporary build with Gap Filler's project in the East Frame/Placemaking at One Central.

properties.Name: Pink Wayfinding Towers
properties.Intro: When many former landmarks were removed, four new bright and fun towers pointed towards activities and places worth a visit.

properties.Name: Yellow' Wayfinding Tower
properties.Intro: When many former landmarks were removed, four new bright and fun towers pointed towards activities and places worth a visit.
properties.Detail:
While the wayfinding purpose of the structure is no longer effective, this corner location remains important. It was considered valuable to investigate reuse of the tower prior to a decision for its removal. Reuse will contribute to Enliven Programme aims through adding activation and amenity. 
The Events and Arts team will accept a transfer of the wayfinding tower from Urban Regeneration
Continue to make the tower available for ongoing public use and fund addition of new artwork
